data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Los Angeles have been awarded a corner by Rubiel Vazquez.
In the minute 2, Corner awarded to Los Angeles.
Goal! Los Angeles have taken a 1-0 lead courtesy of a header from Dejan Jakovic.
Brian Rodriguez instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 5, Corner awarded to Los Angeles.
Goal! Los Angeles extend their lead to 2-0 through Bradley Wright-Phillips.
Ball safe as Los Angeles is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 9, Ball goes out of play for a Vancouver goal kick.
Goal! Bradley Wright-Phillips extends Los Angeles's lead to 3-0.
Jose Cifuentes (Los Angeles) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 14, Great finish from Ranko Veselinovic to give Los Angeles a 4-0 lead.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Los Angeles.
Los Angeles have been awarded a corner by Rubiel Vazquez.
In the minute 22, Los Angeles have been awarded a corner by Rubiel Vazquez.
Vancouver awarded a free kick in their own half.
Marc Dos Santos (Vancouver) is making a first substitution, with Leonard Owusu replacing Theo Bair.
In the minute 25, Corner awarded to Los Angeles.
Free kick for Vancouver in their own half.
Throw-in for Vancouver in their own half.
In the minute 27, Vancouver awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Rubiel Vazquez signals a free kick to Los Angeles in their own half.
Michael Baldisimo (Vancouver) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 29, Rubiel Vazquez signals a free kick to Los Angeles in their own half.
Rubiel Vazquez awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Vancouver in the half of Los Angeles.
In the minute 32, In Los Angeles, Cristian Dajome of Vancouver is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Goal! Los Angeles extend their lead to 5-0 through Diego Rossi.
In the minute 33, Great play from Mark Anthony Kaye to set up the goal.
Vancouver have been awarded a corner by Rubiel Vazquez.
Important block from the Vancouver defence as Bradley Wright-Phillips fires in a strike for Los Angeles.
In the minute 35, Diego Rossi for Los Angeles gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Vancouver have a goal kick.
Rubiel Vazquez signals a Los Angeles throw-in in Vancouver's half.
In the minute 40, Corner awarded to Los Angeles.
Corner awarded to Vancouver.
Rubiel Vazquez signals a throw-in for Vancouver, close to Los Angeles's area.
In the minute 42, Free kick for Vancouver in their own half.
Los Angeles are whistled for offside.
1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
Rubiel Vazquez has blown to start the second-half.
Los Angeles are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Vancouver make their second substitution with Erik Godoy replacing Ranko Veselinovic.
In the minute 46, Andy Rose is on a sub for David Milinkovic for Vancouver.
Vancouver awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 50, Rubiel Vazquez signals a free kick to Vancouver in their own half.
Rubiel Vazquez signals a free kick to Los Angeles.
Can Los Angeles get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Vancouver's half?
In the minute 56, Los Angeles have been awarded a corner by Rubiel Vazquez.
Goal kick for Vancouver at Banc of California Stadium.
Mohammed El Munir is replacing Diego Palacios for Los Angeles at Banc of California Stadium.
In the minute 56, Francisco Ginella is replacing Mark Anthony Kaye for the home team.
The home team have replaced Bradley Wright-Phillips with Danny Musovski. This is the first substitution made today by Bob Bradley.
The home team replace Dejan Jakovic with Jordan Harvey.
In the minute 57, Marc Dos Santos is making the team's fourth substitution at Banc of California Stadium with Fredy Montero replacing Cristian Dajome.
Vancouver to take a throw-in in Los Angeles territory.
Rubiel Vazquez awards Vancouver a goal kick.
In the minute 62, Throw-in for Los Angeles in the half of Vancouver.
Los Angeles pushes forward through Danny Musovski, whose finish on goal is saved.
Los Angeles to take a throw-in in Vancouver territory.
In the minute 64, Los Angeles's Brian Rodriguez is on target but unsuccessful.
Vancouver's Fredy Montero misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 67, Rubiel Vazquez awards Los Angeles a goal kick.
The away team have replaced Janio Bikel with Patrick Metcalfe. This is the fifth substitution made today by Marc Dos Santos.
Brian Rodriguez (Los Angeles) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
It's now 6-0 in Los Angeles as Andy Rose scores for Los Angeles.
In the minute 70, The match at Banc of California Stadium has been interrupted briefly for a check on Lucas Cavallini, who is down injured.
Lucas Cavallini is back on his feet again.
Bryce Duke is replacing Eduard Atuesta for Los Angeles at Banc of California Stadium.
In the minute 73, Corner awarded to Los Angeles.
Free kick for Vancouver in their own half.
Los Angeles drives forward and Latif Blessing gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 77, Vancouver awarded a free kick in their own half.
Vancouver are coming forward and Fredy Montero gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Los Angeles at Banc of California Stadium.
In the minute 82, Throw-in Vancouver.
Los Angeles's Brian Rodriguez gets in a shot on goal at Banc of California Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 83, Los Angeles have been awarded a corner by Rubiel Vazquez.
Jordan Harvey (Los Angeles) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Free kick for Vancouver in their own half.
Danny Musovski of Los Angeles smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 86, Rubiel Vazquez signals a free kick to Vancouver in their own half.
Los Angeles drive upfield and Diego Rossi gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Vancouver defender.
Free kick for Los Angeles in the half of Vancouver.
In the minute 89, Brian Rodriguez for Los Angeles is whistled offside.
Los Angeles have been awarded a corner by Rubiel Vazquez.
Vancouver awarded a free kick in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Los Angeles.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Corner awarded to Los Angeles.
Vancouver have a goal kick.
Free kick Los Angeles.
Ball goes out of play for a Los Angeles goal kick.
That's full-time at Banc of California Stadium. The final score is 6-0.
